item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 39
item.description: Gadget Guru joins us
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 38
item.description: Android MythTV client beta released.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 37
item.description: Android MythTV client continued
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 36
item.description: New Android MythTV client
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 35
item.description: Biggest MythTV Deployment Ever
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 34
item.description: MythTV 0.25 preview. Patrick Archibald joins us.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 33
item.description: Hardware woes. Gadgetguru from the Android Buffet podcast joins us.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 32
item.description: Dan's Prime Adventure
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 31
item.description: Pat installs the Silicondust HDHomerun Prime on his MythTV system. Dan talks about MakeMKV and his new TV.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 30
item.description: The guys discuss the impending release of the Silicon Dust HDHomerun Prime.More details of Pat's recent build. Dan is looking for a new TV. Netflix price increases.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 29
item.description: The guys interview Silicon Dust founder & CTO Nick Kelsey
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 28
item.description: The guys talk to Mythmote developer Tom Kenny
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 27
item.description: MythTV developer Robert McNamara joins us again to talk about the release of MythTV 0.24. Dan rants about HTPC Centric podcast attitude towards Linux.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 26
item.description: Pat Archibald joins us to talk about GoogleTV. Our experiences upgrading to Mythbuntu 10.10.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 25
item.description: Pat interviews Jeremy Hammer from Cetoncorp, makers of the InfiniTV 4 cablecard tuner.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 24
item.description: The guys talk about hardware failures to their systems. Cablecard for MythTV in the near future? Plans for an Android based MythTV client?
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 23
item.description: Dan reveals what he's working on related to MythTV and Android.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 22
item.description: The guys interview MythTV developer Robert McNamara. Blu-Ray support implemented in MythTV. MythNetVision. Project reorganization of MythTV. The death of flash, Silverlight and hopes of HTML5 & Webm
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 21
item.description: The guys talk about their recent trip to the Southeast Linux Fest in Spartanburg, South Carolina. Many tvs and Blu-Ray DVD players now do Netflix streaming.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 20
item.description: The guys talk about upgrading their setups to Mythbuntu 10.4. New features of MythTV 0.23. MythNetVision and Mirobridge. Windows HTPC podcast and other interesting podcasts.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 19
item.description: Interview with Cecil Watson of the LinHES project. Dan talks about upgrading his RAID setup to bigger hard drives. Pat will be speaking at SELF.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 18
item.description: The guys talk about exporting your MythTV recordings to portable media devices such as the Nokia N800 and Android phones.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 17
item.description: MythTV vs Tivo vs AppleTV. MythMote Andorid remote control application.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 16
item.description: Listener emails.Pat's new HDTV.Dan talks about making administration of multiple boxes easier.Netflix streaming on Linux? Boxee and XBMC vs MythTV.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 15
item.description: Dan talks about his new Ion frontend. Pat talks about shopping for a new HDTV. The guys talk to Mythbuntu developers Nick Fox and Mario Limoncello.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 14
item.description: First official listener call in episode.What the guys got for Christmas.Clarifications, corrections and more HDHomerun goodness.MythNetvision looks very promising.Will Netflix show some love to Linux users in the coming year?
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 13
item.description: Dan talks extensively about his install of Mythbuntu 9.10. He basically re-did his entire setup. Some sweat deals on Black Friday for HTPC related items. Listener Eric calls in and asks some questions prior to his first MythTV install.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 12
item.description: Installing Mythbuntu 9.10. MythTV 0.22 officially released. Hauppauge PVR-1212 and VDPAU officially supported out of the box. Re-write of MythUI based on Qt 4*. Ion based front-ends. Listener call in episodes in the near future?
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 11
item.description: Upgrading to MythTV 0.22 prematurely. Database backup and restore utilities. HDTV wall mount kits. Hulu charging for their service next year?
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 10
item.description: The guys talk about OLF. Channel changing via Firewire for channels > 1000. Integrating an HDHomerun into a MythTV setup. Hulu desktop player and integration into MythTV.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 9
item.description: MythTV birds of a feather session from Ohio Linux Fest 2009. Audio was recorded on Saturday Sept. 26, 2009.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 8
item.description: Pat & Dan talk about some of their favorite tv shows.Movie remakes usually suck. Anticipation of the release of MythTV 0.22. Plans for the upcoming Ohio Linux Fest.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 7
item.description: Pat and Dan talk about the coming release of MythTV 0.22. Rant a bit against software patents and the Tivo case. Firming up plans for the upcoming Ohio Linux Fest.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 6
item.description: Pat and Dan talk about building an Nvida Ion based MythTV frontend. Costs involved. Configuration issues and integration with an existing MythTV system. Upcoming Ohio Linux Fest.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 5
item.description: Pat and Dan talk about various utilities available for backing up and restoring your MythTV system.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 4
item.description: Dan and Pat answer some listener questions. They discuss media extenders and how they might be integrated into a MythTV setup.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 3
item.description: Pat & Dan bitch about RCN. They then do a screencast on how to resolve your QAM card channel tunings using Schedules Direct and MythWeb. Finally they discuss what to use for re-encoding recordings for the Nokia N800/N810 internet tablets.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 2
item.description: Pat & Dan discuss listener emails and do a screencast installing Mythbuntu 9.04.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 1
item.description: Pat & Dan talk about purchasing components for your MythTV box.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)

item.title: MythTV Cast - Episode 0
item.description: Pat & Dan talk about MythTV and what you can do with it. They touch on their own personal setups and what will occur in future episodes.
item.author: dan@mythtvcast.com (Daniel Frey)
